SEARCH
Package com.example.eventease.data.firebase

Class FirebaseAdmittedRepository

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventease.data.firebase.FirebaseAdmittedRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdmittedRepository
public class FirebaseAdmittedRepository extends Object implements AdmittedRepository
Firebase implementation of AdmittedRepository. Manages admitted users using AdmittedEntrants subcollection and retrieves upcoming events from Firestore.

  • Method Details

    • admit

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void> admit(String eventId, String uid)
      Description copied from interface: AdmittedRepository
      Moves a user from waitlist to admitted status for an event. This operation removes the user from the waitlist and adds them to the admitted entrants list.
      Specified by:
      admit in interface AdmittedRepository
      Parameters:
      eventId - the unique event identifier
      uid - the unique user identifier
      Returns:
      a Task that completes when the user is admitted

    • isAdmitted

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Boolean> isAdmitted(String eventId, String uid)
      Description copied from interface: AdmittedRepository
      Checks if a user is admitted to an event.
      Specified by:
      isAdmitted in interface AdmittedRepository
      Parameters:
      eventId - the unique event identifier
      uid - the unique user identifier
      Returns:
      a Task that completes with true if the user is admitted, false otherwise

    • getUpcomingEvents

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<List<Event>> getUpcomingEvents(String uid)
      Description copied from interface: AdmittedRepository
      Gets all upcoming events for a user where they are in the AdmittedEntrants collection. An event is considered upcoming if its deadline (or start time) has not yet passed.
      Specified by:
      getUpcomingEvents in interface AdmittedRepository
      Parameters:
      uid - the unique user identifier
      Returns:
      a Task that completes with a list of upcoming events the user is admitted to

    • getPreviousEvents

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<List<Event>> getPreviousEvents(String uid)
      Gets previous events (events where the event start date has passed) for a user. Includes ALL events the user was associated with (waitlisted, selected, non-selected, cancelled, or admitted).
      Specified by:
      getPreviousEvents in interface AdmittedRepository
      Parameters:
      uid - the user ID to get previous events for
      Returns:
      a Task that resolves to a list of previous events
